text: Arasye sihamte kupharai karaiche yisakale kaya ye, ‘mara'iyamara putra machihe'i allaha’. Koraa, ‘yadi allahe machiha ibane mara'iyamaka arau te'omra makaka arau prthiraira majata yi ache se'i sakaloke dhbansa karaiba bicarae tente te'omka badha dibalai kara sakti ache’? Akasamandala arau prthirai arau e'i duyora majata yi ache se'i sakaloborara sarbabhaumatba kerala allaharae'i. Te'om yi iccha srsti karae arau allaha sakalo bastura oparata ksamatabana
